title: Can I become a forensic scientist with a bachelor of science? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the United States, the answer is yes; however, there is a specific position within in the DNA field that requires at least a master’s degree. This is the technical lead position. Per the FBI Quality Assurance Standards for DNA testing labs, every qualified forensic DNA lab in the US must have a technical leader. The rest of the analysts in the unit need at least a BS degree.
